beforeNormalization: {"id":"egy-beg-004-verbs","title":{"arabic":"مقدمة في الأفعال المصرية: الماضي والحاضر","english":"Introduction to Egyptian Verbs: Past & Present","transliteration":"Muqaddima fi el-af'al el-masreya: El-madi w el-hader"},"level":"beginner","description":{"arabic":"درس أساسي عن تصريف الأفعال المهمة في العامية المصرية. سنتعلم الضمائر، ونظام المضارع (بـ)، ونهايات الماضي البسيطة.","english":"A fundamental lesson on how to conjugate essential verbs in Egyptian Arabic. We will cover pronouns, the 'Bi-' present tense system, and basic past tense endings."},"learningObjectives":["Identify and use Egyptian subject pronouns","Conjugate common verbs in the Present Tense using 'Bi'","Conjugate common verbs in the Past Tense","Distinguish between actions happening now versus completed actions"],"estimatedDuration":25,"prerequisites":["None"],"subLessons":[{"id":"sl-01-pronouns","title":{"arabic":"الضمائر الشخصية","english":"Subject Pronouns","transliteration":"El-dama'er el-shakhseya"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"أنا، انت، هو، هي","english":"I, You, He, She","transliteration":"Ana, Enta, Howwa, Heyya"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"أنا","english":"I","transliteration":"Ana"},{"arabic":"إنتَ","english":"You (male)","transliteration":"Enta"},{"arabic":"إنتي","english":"You (female)","transliteration":"Enti"},{"arabic":"هو","english":"He","transliteration":"Howwa"},{"arabic":"هي","english":"She","transliteration":"Heyya"},{"arabic":"إحنا","english":"We","transliteration":"Ehna"},{"arabic":"هما","english":"They","transliteration":"Homma"}],"explanations":[{"english":"In Egyptian Arabic, we use 'Ehna' for 'We' instead of the formal 'Nahnu'.
